segments.text: How many pieces of luggage do you want to check , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to check these three pieces and I'll carry this carry-on bag with me on board .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok.Is this your luggage properly labelled , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok.Would you please put all your luggage on the scales ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hand-baggage is not to be weighed , sir ... I'm sorry , sir , you're 25 kilos overweight . I'm afraid there'll be an excess luggage charge , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much should I pay for the excess weight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ten yuan for each kilogram.You ' ll have to pay 250 yuan for the excess baggage .
segments.speaker: S1
